message.universegate.use_keyboard_destin: Use the Keyboard to set a destination.
message.universegate.update_available: A new UniverseGate update is available (%s):
message.universegate.engineer_gift: A village engineer thanks you for bringing portal tech to the village.
advancement.universegate.portal_core_pla: You placed a Portal Core. This is either science or a very expensive button.
advancement.universegate.portal_keyboard: You placed the Portal Controller. Try not to type your password into it.
advancement.universegate.discover_rift_d: Welcome to the Rift: no neighbors, no signal, just you, the void, and your life choices.
advancement.universegate.first_rift_shad: You defeated your first Rift Shade. The void now knows your name.
You found a Rift cube. It reminds me of my house built with dirt.
advancement.universegate.return_from_rif: You made it from the Rift to the Overworld. Fresh air and creepers, just like home.
